00016 unsigned int encryptConst1 = 0xf1a372d5;
00017 unsigned int encryptConst2 = 0x3a1fd527;
00018 unsigned int encryptConst3 = 0xfa7d5231;
00019 unsigned int encryptConst4 = 0xaf572d13;
00020 
00021 
00022 void HandleClientVersion(int VER_A, int VER_B, int VER_C) {
00023   encryptConst1 = ((VER_A<<23)|(VER_B<<14)|(VER_C<<4))
00024                 ^ 0x2c13a5fd^(VER_B*VER_B)^((VER_C*VER_C)<<9)
00025                 ^ ((VER_C*7)<<19)^((VER_B*11)<<24);
00026   encryptConst2 = ((VER_A<<22)|(VER_C<<13)|(VER_B<<3))
00027                 ^ 0xa31d527f^(VER_B*VER_B)^((VER_C*VER_C*3)<<10)
00028                 ^ ((VER_C*7)<<18)^((VER_B*13)<<23);
00029  }

00049 
00050 void checkSockets(char *fileName, int line)
00051 {
00052         return;                  // <----------- THIS RETURN GOES AWAY TO TURN ON SOCKET CHECKING!
00053 
00054         PROFILER(3);
00055 
00056         CSocket *socky = sockList;
00057         while (socky)
00058         {
00059                 if (socky->nextSock) 
00060                 {
00061                         if (socky->nextSock->prevSock != socky)
00062                         {
00063                                 printf("\nBad link in socket: (%s %d)\n", fileName, line);
00064         #ifdef WIN32
00065                                 _asm int 3
00066         #endif
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 if (socky->outList)
00071                 {
00072                         NetOutList *goingOut = socky->outList;
00073 
00074                         if (goingOut->prev)
00075                         {
00076                                 printf("\nOutlist header has a prev pointer: (%s %d)\n", fileName, line);
00077         #ifdef WIN32
00078                                 _asm int 3
00079         #endif
00080                         }
00081 
00082                         while (goingOut)
00083                         {
00084                                 if (goingOut==socky->outListEnd && goingOut->next)
00085                                 {
00086                                         printf("\nOutlistEnd is not the end of the list: (%s, %d)\n", fileName, line);
00087           #ifdef WIN32
00088                                   _asm int 3
00089           #endif
00090                                 }
00091 
00092                                 if (goingOut->owner != socky)
00093                                 {
00094                                         printf("\nOutlist member does not point back to owned socket: (%s %d)\n", fileName, line);
00095           #ifdef WIN32
00096                                 _asm int 3
00097           #endif
00098                                 }
00099 
00100                                 if (!goingOut->next && socky->outListEnd!=goingOut)
00101                                 {
00102                                         printf("\nThe net out list ends before OutlistEnd was seen: (%s, %d)\n", fileName, line);
00103           #ifdef WIN32
00104                                 _asm int 3
00105           #endif
00106                                 }
00107 
00108                                 goingOut = goingOut->next;
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111 
00112 
00113                 socky = socky->nextSock;
00114         }
00115 
00116         CUserSocket *monkey = userSockList;
00117         int howMany = CUserSocket::openUserSockets;
00118 
00119         while (monkey)
00120         {
00121                 if (!strlen(monkey->userId) && monkey->activity>=LoggedIn)
00122                 {
00123                         printf("\nBad userId in socket: (%s , %d)\n", fileName, line);
00124       #ifdef WIN32
00125       _asm int 3
00126       #endif
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 if (monkey->magicNumber != MAGIC_NUMBER)
00130                 {
00131                         printf("\nBad magic number in socket: (%s, %d)\n", fileName, line);
00132       #ifdef WIN32
00133       _asm int 3
00134       #endif
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 if (monkey->nextMasterU) {
00138                         if (monkey->nextMasterU->prevMasterU != monkey)
00139                         {
00140                                 printf("\nBad link in socket: (%s %d)\n", fileName, line);
00141         #ifdef WIN32
00142         _asm int 3
00143         #endif
00144                         }
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 if (monkey->ipaddr)
00148                         howMany--;
00149 
00150                 monkey = monkey->nextMasterU;
00151         }
00152 
00153         if (howMany) {
00154                 printf("\nSocket counter is off by %d: (%s %d)\n", howMany, fileName, line);
00155     #ifdef WIN32
00156     _asm int 3
00157     #endif
00158         }
00159 
00160 }
00161 #else
00162 #define checkSockets(a,b) 
00163 #endif

00172 CUserSocket::CUserSocket(SOCKET new_sock, u_int hostIP, int _ninja) 
00173 {
00174         userId[0] = 0;
00175         password[0] = 0;
00176 
00177         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00178 
00179         magicNumber = MAGIC_NUMBER;
00180 
00181         nextMasterU = userSockList;
00182         if (nextMasterU)
00183                 nextMasterU->prevMasterU = this;
00184 
00185         prevMasterU = NULL;
00186         userSockList = this;
00187 
00188         prevU = nextU = NULL;
00189         firstPacket = lastPacket = NULL;
00190         m_sock = new_sock;
00191         ipaddr = hostIP;
00192         inpSize = 0;
00193         connectId = 0;
00194         packetSize = 0;
00195         recvAmt = 0;
00196         totQueuedSize = 0;
00197         nextId = 1;
00198         accountNum = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00199         handingOff = 0;
00200         activity = JustCreated;
00201         ucSock = NULL;
00202         strangePackets = -1;
00203         internal = 0;
00204         timeCreated = timeGetTime();
00205         ninja = _ninja;
00206         service = 0;
00207 
00208         memset(garbageArea, 0, sizeof(garbageArea));
00209 
00210         if (subnetMask)
00211         {
00212     u_int hostSubnet = ipaddr & subnetMask;
00213                 if (hostSubnet == subnet)
00214                 {
00215                         internal = 1;
00216                 }
00217                 // quick hack: owo sites are ok too
00218     if (((ipaddr>>8)&0xffffff) == ((207<<16)|(239<<8)|134))
00219       internal = 1;
00220         }
00221 
00222         char buffer[100];
00223 
00224         setsockopt (m_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_DONTLINGER, NULL, 0);
00225 
00226         if (ipaddr)
00227         {
00228                 openUserSockets++;
00229 
00230                 sprintf(buffer, "User connected: %s %s", ipAddress(ipaddr), (internal) ? "(internal)" : "");
00231                 journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, NORMAL_MSG, 0, buffer);
00232 
00233                 if (openUserSockets>maxOpenUserSockets)
00234                         maxOpenUserSockets = openUserSockets;
00235         }
00236 
00237         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00238 
00239 }

00244 
00245 CUserSocket::~CUserSocket() 
00246 {
00247 
00248         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00249 
00250         if (nextMasterU)
00251                 nextMasterU->prevMasterU = prevMasterU;
00252 
00253         if (prevMasterU)
00254                 prevMasterU->nextMasterU = nextMasterU;
00255         else
00256                 userSockList = nextMasterU;
00257 
00258         if (nextU)
00259                 nextU->prevU = prevU;
00260 
00261         if (prevU)
00262                 prevU->nextU = nextU;
00263         else if (userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] == this)
00264                 userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] = nextU;
00265 
00266         if (ipaddr)
00267         {
00268                 openUserSockets--;
00269         }
00270 
00271         if (!handingOff)
00272         {
00273                 if (ucSock)
00274                 {
00275                         ucSock = NULL;
00276                 }
00277                 else
00278                 {
00279                         asyncClientLogout(accountNum, 0);
00280                 }
00281         }
00282 
00283         while (firstPacket)
00284         {
00285                 UserPacket *u = firstPacket;
00286                 firstPacket = firstPacket->next;
00287                 delete u;
00288         }
00289 
00290         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00291 
00292 }

00295 void CUserSocket::ChangeId(u_int newId)
00296 {
00297         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00298 
00299         if (nextU)
00300         {
00301                 nextU->prevU = prevU;
00302         }
00303 
00304         if (prevU)
00305         {
00306                 prevU->nextU = nextU;
00307         }
00308         else if (userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] == this)
00309         {
00310                 userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] = nextU;
00311         }
00312 
00313         connectId = newId;
00314 
00315         nextU = userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK];
00316 
00317         if (nextU)
00318         {
00319                 nextU->prevU = this;
00320         }
00321 
00322         prevU = NULL;
00323         userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] = this;
00324 
00325         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00326 
00327 }

00330 void CUserSocket::AddToQueue(char *data, int size, u_int packetId, BOOL clearTimeOut)
00331 {
00332         PROFILE(14);
00333 
00334         if (clearTimeOut)
00335                 timeOut = 0;
00336 
00337         u_int num;
00338 
00339         if (size==VariableLength)
00340         {
00341                 size = ntohs(*(short *)&data[1]);
00342         }
00343 
00344         // encrypt data
00345 
00346         if (encryptOutgoingUserSocket)
00347         {
00348                 char *data2 = data;
00349                 for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) 
00350                 {
00351                         #ifdef BIGENDIAN
00352                                 *data2 ^= *(((char *)(&encryptCode[2]))+3);
00353                         #else
00354                                 *data2 ^= *((char *)(&encryptCode[2]));
00355                         #endif
00356                         num = encryptCode[3]>>31;
00357                         encryptCode[3] = ((encryptCode[3]<<1)|(encryptCode[2]>>31)) ^ encryptConst3;
00358                         encryptCode[2] = ((encryptCode[2]<<1)|(num))                ^ encryptConst4;
00359                         data2++;
00360                  }
00361         }
00362 
00363         new NetOutList(this, data, size);
00364 }

00368 void CUserSocket::HandleUserPacket(char *packet) 
00369 {
00370 
00371 
00372         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00373 
00374         totQueuedSize += packetSize;
00375         if (totQueuedSize >= MAX_QUEUE_PER_PLAYER)
00376                 deleteFlag = 1;
00377 
00378         UserPacket *p = new UserPacket(packet, packetSize, nextId);
00379 
00380         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00381 
00382         nextId += 2;
00383         p->next = NULL;
00384         if (!firstPacket)
00385         {
00386                 firstPacket = p;
00387         }
00388 
00389         if (lastPacket)
00390         {
00391                 lastPacket->next = p;
00392         }
00393 
00394         lastPacket = p;
00395         // packet is now in this user's packet list
00396         // now send to user central
00397 
00398         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00399 
00400         p->Send(connectId, this);
00401 
00402         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00403  }
00404

00408 // this should now read into its own receive buffer, recognize complete
00409 // packets, number them and keep a queue of unconfirmed ones, and put any
00410 // completed packets into the usercent output buffer
00411 
00412 void CUserSocket::HandleInput() 
00413 {
00414         PROFILE(15);
00415 
00416         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00417 
00418         int rc, i;
00419         u_int num;
00420         int lastPacketType, lastPacketSize;
00421 
00422         if (!ninja && inpSize >= 4)
00423         { // connectId gotten
00424 
00425                 rc = recv(m_sock, recvBuf+recvAmt, MAX_PACKET_SIZE-recvAmt, 0);
00426 
00427                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00428 
00429                 if (rc==0)
00430                 {
00431                         return;
00432                 }
00433 
00434                 if (rc < 0)
00435                 {
00436                         deleteFlag = 1;
00437                         return;
00438                 }
00439 
00440                 CSocket::inbound += rc;
00441 
00442                 int recvOfs = 0;
00443 
00444 
00445                 // decrypt
00446                 for (i = 0; i < rc; i++)
00447                 {
00448                         if (encryptIncomingUserSocket)
00449                         {
00450                           #ifdef BIGENDIAN
00451                                 recvBuf[recvAmt++] ^= *(((char *)(&encryptCode[0]))+3);
00452                           #else
00453                                 recvBuf[recvAmt++] ^= *((char *)(&encryptCode[0]));
00454                           #endif
00455                         }
00456                         else
00457                         {
00458                                 // TODO: Boy is this dumb. 
00459 
00460                                 recvBuf[recvAmt++] ^= 0;
00461                         }
00462                         num = encryptCode[1]<<31;
00463                         encryptCode[1] = ((encryptCode[1]>>1)|(encryptCode[0]<<31)) ^ encryptConst1;
00464                         encryptCode[0] = ((encryptCode[0]>>1)|(num))                ^ encryptConst2;
00465                 }
00466                 
00467                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00468 
00469                 while (recvOfs < recvAmt) 
00470                 {
00471                         if (packetSize) 
00472                         {
00473                                 // complete packet at recvBuf+recvOfs
00474                                 if (recvAmt < packetSize)
00475                                         break;
00476 
00477                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00478 
00479                                 HandleUserPacket(recvBuf+recvOfs);
00480 
00481                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00482 
00483                                 recvOfs += packetSize;
00484                                 packetSize = 0;
00485                         }
00486                         else 
00487                         {
00488                                 // don't have packet size yet, which means either 0 bytes
00489                                 // processed or variable size and < 3 bytes received
00490                                 int packetType = (u_char)recvBuf[recvOfs];
00491 
00492                                 // close connection on any unrecognized packet
00493                                 if (packetType < 0 || packetType >= PACKET_NUMBER_OF)
00494                                 {
00495                                         deleteFlag = 1;
00496                                         break;
00497                                 }
00498 
00499                                 packetSize = PacketTable[packetType].size;
00500 
00501                                 if (!packetSize)
00502                                 {
00503                                         deleteFlag = 1;
00504                                         break;
00505                                 }
00506 
00507                                 if (packetSize == VariableLength) 
00508                                 {
00509                                         if (recvAmt-recvOfs < 3) 
00510                                         {
00511                                                 packetSize = 0;
00512                                                 break;
00513                                         }
00514                                         memcpy(&packetSize, recvBuf+recvOfs+1, 2);
00515                                         NetworkToHost(packetSize);
00516                                         if (packetSize > MAX_PACKET_SIZE) 
00517                                         {
00518                                                 deleteFlag = 1;
00519                                                 break;
00520                                         }
00521                         }
00522 
00523                                 lastPacketType = packetType;
00524                                 lastPacketSize = packetSize;
00525                         }
00526                 }       // while
00527 
00528                 if (recvOfs)
00529                 {
00530                         if (recvAmt == recvOfs)
00531                         {
00532                                 recvAmt = 0;
00533                         }
00534                         else 
00535                         {
00536                                 if (recvOfs>recvAmt)
00537                                 {
00538                                         journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, FATAL_ERROR_MSG, 0, "RecvOfs = %d, RecvAmt = %d, PacketType = %d, PacketSize = %d", recvOfs, recvAmt,lastPacketType,lastPacketSize);
00539                                         deleteFlag = 1;
00540                                         return;
00541                                 }
00542 
00543                                 // shift buffer back by recvOfs
00544                                 for (i = recvOfs; i < recvAmt; i++)
00545                                 {
00546                                         recvBuf[i-recvOfs] = recvBuf[i];
00547                                 }
00548                                 recvAmt -= recvOfs;
00549                         }
00550                 }
00551         }
00552         else
00553         {
00554 
00555                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00556 
00557                 rc = recv(m_sock, ((char *)&connectId)+inpSize, 4-inpSize, 0);
00558 
00559                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00560 
00561                 if (rc > 0) 
00562                 {
00563                         inpSize += rc;
00564                         CSocket::inbound += rc;
00565                 }
00566                 else
00567                 {
00568                         deleteFlag = 1;
00569                         return;
00570                 }
00571 
00572             if (!ninja && inpSize == 4) 
00573                 {
00574 
00575                         // completed getting connectId
00576                         connectId = ntohl(connectId);
00577                         // put in the userTable
00578                         nextU = userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK];
00579                         if (nextU)
00580                         nextU->prevU = this;
00581                         prevU = NULL;
00582                         userTable[connectId&U_HASHMASK] = this;
00583                         // save initial encryption keys
00584                         // 0 and 1 are client -> server
00585                         // 2 and 3 are server -> client
00586 
00587                         int other = ~connectId;
00588 
00589                         encryptCode[0] = ((connectId&0x0000ffff)^0x0000aaaa)
00590                                                  | ((other   <<16       )^0x13570000);
00591                         encryptCode[1] = ((other   &0xffff0000)^0xabcd0000)
00592                                                  | ((connectId>>16       )^0x00004321);
00593                         encryptCode[2] = ((connectId&0xf0f0f0f0)^0xa06020e0)
00594                                                  | ((other   &0x0f0f0f0f)^0x070e050a);
00595                         encryptCode[3] = ((other   &0xf0f0f0f0)^0xf0b03090)
00596                                                  | ((connectId&0x0f0f0f0f)^0x040c010d);
00597 
00598              }
00599                  else if (ninja)
00600                  {
00601                         // Here's the Code that UOMonitor uses!!!
00602 
00603                         char buffer[1024];
00604 
00605                         sprintf(buffer, "Ninja port accessed from: %s %s", ipAddress(ipaddr), (internal) ? "(internal)" : "");
00606                         journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, NORMAL_MSG, 0, buffer);
00607 
00608                         if (((char *)&connectId)[0]=='!')
00609                         {
00610                                 sprintf(buffer, "%s\r\n", appName);
00611 
00612                                 int t = timeGetTime();
00613                                 Britannia *b = Britannias;
00614                                 for (int i=0; i<numBritannias; i++, b++)
00615                                 {
00616                                         char *status = NULL;
00617                                         if (b->socket)
00618                                         {
00619                                                 status = "down";
00620 
00621                                                 int s = abs(b->status);
00622 
00623                                                 if ((s&BRIT_INTERNAL) && !internal)
00624                                                 {
00625                                                         status = NULL;
00626                                                 }
00627                                                 else if (b->socket->m_sock != INVALID_SOCKET)
00628                                                 {
00629                                                         if (b->socket->getCurrentTotalUserCount()!=-1)
00630                                                         {
00631                                                                 status = "up";
00632                                                         }
00633                                                 }
00634 
00635                                         }
00636 
00637                                         if (status)
00638                                         {
00639                                                 char temp[80];
00640                                                 // BEGIN JEFFCHANGES
00641                                                 // USE TO BE THIS:
00642                                                 // sprintf(temp, "%s: %s for %s\r\n", b->name, status, msToStr(t-b->timer));    
00643                                                 sprintf(temp, "%s: %s\r\n", b->name, status );
00644                                                 // END JEFFCHANGES
00645                                                 strcat(buffer, temp);
00646                                         }
00647                                 }
00648 
00649                                 int len = strlen(buffer);
00650                                 CSocket::outbound += len;
00651                                 assert(CSocket::outbound>0);
00652 
00653                                 if (CSocket::outbound<=0)
00654                                 {
00655                                         deleteFlag |= 3;
00656                                         return;
00657                                 }
00658 
00659                                 send (m_sock, buffer, len, 0);
00660                         }
00661                         deleteFlag = 1;
00662                 }
00663         }
00664 
00665         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00666 }

00668 
00669 
00670 void CUserSocket::TimeOut() 
00671 {
00672         // Find the SocketDBProc with this socket, so we can get to the character data.
00673 
00674         timeOut = 0;
00675 
00676         if (activity!=PostLogin)
00677         {
00678                 journalEntry(ACCOUNT_MSG, WARNING_MSG, accountNum, "Time out. Undoing last command or disconnecting.");
00679 
00680                 if (individualAccountLogging)
00681                 {
00682                         logEntry(Time_out, -1, ipaddr, accountNum, activity);
00683                 }
00684         }
00685 
00686         Britannia *b = NULL;
00687 
00688         switch(activity) 
00689         {
00690                 case PostLogin:
00691                 {
00692                         if (strangePackets<MAX_STRANGE_PACKETS)
00693                         {
00694                                 ucSock = NULL;
00695                         }
00696                         deleteFlag = 1;
00697                         break;
00698                 }
00699 
00700                 case SelectingBritannia:
00701                 {
00702                         PDSTRUCT_BRITANNIA_SELECT *britSel = (PDSTRUCT_BRITANNIA_SELECT *)lastUserCentralPacket;
00703                         undoSelectBritannia(ntohs(britSel->num), this);
00704                         break;
00705                 }
00706 
00707                 case LoggedIn:
00708                 {
00709                         char *error = new char[2];
00710                         assert(error);
00711 
00712                         if (!error)
00713                         {
00714                                 AbnormalExit;
00715                         }
00716 
00717                         error[0] = (char)PACKET_ACCT_LOGIN_FAIL;
00718                         error[1] = (char)ACCT_SERVER_FAIL;
00719                         AddToQueue(error, 2,  0);
00720                         deleteFlag = 1;
00721                         break;
00722                 }
00723         }
00724 
00725         if (b)
00726         {
00727                 b->timeOuts++;
00728         }
00729 }

00733 UserPacket::UserPacket(char *thedata, int thesize, u_int theid)

00736         memcpy(data, thedata, thesize);
00737         size = thesize;
00738         id = theid;

00750 
00751 void UserPacket::Send(u_int connectId, CUserSocket *socket) 
00752 {
00753         u_char packetId = (*(u_char *)data);
00754 
00755         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00756 
00757         switch(packetId)
00758         {
00759                 case PACKET_HARDWARE_INFO:
00760                 {
00761                         if (socket->activity!=LoggedIn)
00762                         {
00763                                 journalEntry(ACCOUNT_MSG, ERROR_MSG, socket->accountNum,
00764                                         "A hardware record packet was received but the socket's state is %s",
00765                                         activityDesc[socket->activity]);
00766                                 logEntry(Hardware_record_unexpected, -1, socket->ipaddr, socket->accountNum, socket->activity);
00767                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00768                                 break;
00769                         }
00770 
00771                         PDSTRUCT_HARDWARE_INFO *p = (PDSTRUCT_HARDWARE_INFO *)data;
00772                         asyncInsertHardwareRecord(p, socket->accountNum);
00773                         break;
00774                 }
00775 
00776                 case PACKET_ACCT_LOGIN_REQ:
00777                 {
00778                         socket->activity = JustCreated;
00779                         PlayerAccountKey *p = (PlayerAccountKey *)(data+sizeof(char));
00780                         p->check();
00781                         BYTE loginKey = *(BYTE *)(data+sizeof(char)+sizeof(PlayerAccountKey));
00782                         asyncClientLogin(p, loginKey,  connectId);
00783 
00784                         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00785 
00786                         break;
00787                 }
00788 
00789                 case PACKET_LOGOUT:
00790                 {
00791                         if (socket)
00792                         {
00793                                 // We set handingOff to 1 here so the logout doesn't happen in ~CUserSocket as well
00794                                 socket->handingOff = 1;
00795                                 socket->activity = LoggedOut;
00796 
00797                                 if (socket->ucSock) 
00798                                 {
00799                                         socket->ucSock = NULL;
00800                                 }
00801                                 else 
00802                                 {
00803                                         asyncClientLogout(socket->accountNum, connectId);
00804                                         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00805                                 }
00806                         }
00807                   break;
00808                 }
00809 
00810                 case PACKET_BRITANNIA_SELECT:
00811                 {
00812                         PDSTRUCT_BRITANNIA_SELECT *britSel = (PDSTRUCT_BRITANNIA_SELECT *)data;
00813                         Britannia fake;
00814                         strcpy(fake.name, "<none>");
00815                         fake.num = -1;
00816                         Britannia *b = &fake;
00817                         int bnum = ntohs(britSel->num);
00818 
00819                         if (bnum >= 0 && bnum < numBritannias)
00820                         {
00821                                 b = &Britannias[bnum];
00822                                 CUserCentralSocket *usSock = b->socket;
00823                                 if (usSock && usSock->m_sock != INVALID_SOCKET)
00824                                 {
00825                                         socket->activity = SelectingBritannia;
00826                                         memcpy(socket->lastUserCentralPacket, britSel, sizeof(PDSTRUCT_BRITANNIA_SELECT));
00827                                         asyncSelectBritannia(socket->accountNum, bnum, britSel);
00828                                         return;
00829                                 }
00830                         }
00831 
00832                         // LOGIN REJECT
00833                         journalEntry(ACCOUNT_MSG, NOTIFY_MSG, socket->accountNum, "Couldn't select %s. It was down.", b->name);
00834                         //logEntry(Couldnt_play_Britannia_down, b->num, socket->ipaddr, socket->accountNum);
00835 
00836                         // send a login reject becuase the britannia is down
00837                         char *loginReject = new char[2];
00838                         loginReject[0] = PACKET_LOGIN_REJECT;
00839                         loginReject[1] = CantFind;
00840                         socket->AddToQueue(loginReject, 2, 0);
00841                         socket->activity = LoggedIn;
00842 
00843                         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00844 
00845                         break;
00846                 }
00847 
00848                 default:
00849                         journalEntry(ACCOUNT_MSG, FATAL_ERROR_MSG, socket->accountNum, 
00850                                 "Hack alert: bad packet id (%d) from %s", packetId, ipAddress(socket->ipaddr));
00851 
00852                         if (socket->accountNum!=-1)
00853                         {
00854                                 // There area way too many of these too. Don't log them in the database.
00855                                 //logEntry(Hack_alert_bad_packet_id, -1, socket->ipaddr, socket->accountNum, packetId);
00856                         }
00857         }
00858 
00859         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00860 
00861  }
